supplements.name: Multivitamin
supplements.benefits: Provides a balanced intake of various vitamins and minerals.

supplements.name: Vitamin D
supplements.benefits: Supports bone health and immune function, especially important during winter months.

supplements.name: Omega-3 Fatty Acids
supplements.benefits: Promotes heart health and reduces inflammation, typically derived from fish oil.

supplements.name: Vitamin C
supplements.benefits: Boosts the immune system and acts as an antioxidant.

supplements.name: Calcium
supplements.benefits: Maintains bone and dental health, and helps prevent osteoporosis.

supplements.name: Probiotics
supplements.benefits: Improves gut health and aids digestion.

supplements.name: Magnesium
supplements.benefits: Necessary for muscle function, nerve function, blood sugar control, and protein synthesis.

supplements.name: Vitamin B Complex
supplements.benefits: Crucial for energy production, brain function, and cell metabolism.

supplements.name: Iron
supplements.benefits: Essential for red blood cell production and preventing iron deficiency anemia, especially in women.

supplements.name: Zinc
supplements.benefits: Important for immune function, wound healing, and protein synthesis.

supplements.name: Vitamin E
supplements.benefits: A powerful antioxidant that protects cells from damage.

supplements.name: Selenium
supplements.benefits: Acts as an antioxidant and supports thyroid function.

supplements.name: Coenzyme Q10
supplements.benefits: Helps with energy production and acts as an antioxidant.

supplements.name: Vitamin K
supplements.benefits: Important for blood clotting and bone health.

supplements.name: Iodine
supplements.benefits: Necessary for the production of thyroid hormones.

supplements.name: Potassium
supplements.benefits: Essential for electrolyte balance, muscle function, and heart health.

supplements.name: Choline
supplements.benefits: Important for brain function and liver health.

supplements.name: Biotin (Vitamin B7)
supplements.benefits: Supports healthy skin, hair, and nails.

supplements.name: Curcumin
supplements.benefits: Derived from turmeric, it has anti-inflammatory properties.

supplements.name: Glucosamine
supplements.benefits: Supports joint health and helps alleviate symptoms of arthritis.
